channel.title: Very minor water graphic annoyance
channel.description:
This is really minor, and I understand its the fault of the engine, but it would be nice if the areas that you are allowed to walk on, that are slightly submerged in water where shallow enough not to encounter the graphic defect, I made a quick vid (but I was attacked by a bull squid!! lol)
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rzjt6mKTRQ[/url] map : bm_c2a3b at: 640 x, -471 y, -103 z setpos 640.853577 -471.176056 -103.968750;setang 18.295071 -3.838620 0.000000
also I must say this mod is amazing dev's... really is. I would love to donate if I could. Best single player fps I've played in a long time!
Edit!- also if you use the glocks secondary fire underwater, it makes a funny noise (also i guess the secondary fire for glock was removed??)

item.title: Very minor water graphic annoyance
item.dc:creator: Lynix1
item.description:
Sephiroth:

This is really minor, and I understand its the fault of the engine, but it would be nice if the areas that you are allowed to walk on, that are slightly submerged in water where shallow enough not to encounter the graphic defect, I made a quick vid (but I was attacked by a bull squid!! lol)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rzjt6mKTRQ
map : bm_c2a3b at: 640 x, -471 y, -103 z
setpos 640.853577 -471.176056 -103.968750;setang 18.295071 -3.838620 0.000000

also I must say this mod is amazing dev’s… really is. I would love to donate if I could. Best single player fps I’ve played in a long time!

Edit!- also if you use the glocks secondary fire underwater, it makes a funny noise (also i guess the secondary fire for glock was removed??)

Noooo leave it!!! I’ve used this as a tactical advantage for seeing better underwater for years!!! lol

Read full topic
